entry.title: Current Conditions: Ice Crystals, -27.4°C

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 29.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Fog at times overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 29. Wind chill minus 33 this evening and minus 40 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CST Friday 10 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 20.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Fog at times in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 20. Wind chill minus 38 in the morning and minus 28 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CST Friday 10 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 23.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h in the evening. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 28 in the evening and minus 34 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CST Friday 10 March 2023
